_comment_id: Unique identifier for the Shin fractal tree simulation.
label: Shin Tree
_comment_label: Player-facing name for this fractal tree visualization.
_comment_branchFactor: Number of child branches per segment. 2 for binary splits, 3 for ternary.
_comment_baseSpreadDeg: Base angle spread in degrees between child branches (5-45 range).
_comment_lengthDecay: Multiplier for child branch length relative to parent (0.55-0.85 range).
_comment_maxDepth: Maximum recursion depth of the fractal tree (6-13 range).
_comment_angleJitterDeg: Random angle variation in degrees for organic asymmetry (0-6 range).
_comment_gravityBend: Downward bend factor proportional to depth for natural droop (0-0.25 range).
_comment_growthRate: Number of branch segments grown per frame for stepwise animation (1-20 range).
_comment_renderStyle: Branch rendering style: 'straight' for linear segments or 'bezier' for subtle curves.
_comment_showLeaves: Whether to render small circular leaves at terminal nodes.
_comment_bgColor: Background color for the simulation canvas.
_comment_trunkColor: Color for the trunk and main branches (light ink).
_comment_twigColor: Color for terminal twigs and small branches (soft cyan).
_comment_leafColor: Color for optional leaves at terminal nodes.
_comment_baseWidth: Line width in pixels for the root trunk.
_comment_minWidth: Minimum line width in pixels for the smallest twigs.
_comment_rootLength: Length in pixels of the initial root segment.
_comment_rootX: Horizontal position of tree root as proportion of canvas width (0-1).
_comment_rootY: Vertical position of tree root as proportion of canvas height (0-1).
